title: Not quite what the Fed’s looking for
itunes:title: Not quite what the Fed’s looking for
itunes:author: Marketplace / Kai Ryssdal
description: A cooling labor market means cooling inflation — at least in theory. But fresh data shows that job openings are growing and the quits rate remains high. Today, we’ll dig into the implications for workers and the Federal Reserve. Then, we’ll travel back to Buffalo, New York, to hear how the pandemic has altered the trajectories of a global hospitality company, a small inn and a young worker.
